alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 2:30AM PDT until March 28 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts over 40 mph possible. * WHERE...In Nevada, Clark and southern Nye County including Las Vegas and Pahrump. In California, the Western Mojave Desert including Barstow. * WHEN...10 AM this morning through 7PM tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow away unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
